function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The impact of virtual space on traditional lifestyles and spatial organization of society","Impact":"Disruption of traditional community patterns, increased isolation, and reduced reliance on physical facilities","Mitigation":"Community engagement programs, promoting mixed-use spaces, and integrating virtual and physical spaces","Technologies":"Virtual reality, augmented reality, online platforms for community engagement","People":"Residents, community organizers, urban planners","Owner":"Community organizations, city governments, technology developers"},{"Description":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual information networks undermining physical transportation networks","Impact":"Reduced use of physical transportation networks, increased reliance on virtual information networks, potential decrease in physical mobility","Mitigation":"Promotion of sustainable transportation options, enhancing digital literacy and access to virtual platforms, integrating virtual and physical mobility solutions","Technologies":"Smart mobility solutions, digital infrastructure, virtual collaboration platforms","People":"Residents, transportation planners, digital infrastructure developers","Owner":"City governments, transportation agencies, digital technology companies"},{"Description":"COVID-19 accelerating the impact of virtual space on residents' lifestyles and causing changes in the use of community service facilities","Impact":"Increased reliance on virtual community services, decreased use of physical community facilities, potential decrease in community cohesion","Mitigation":"Resilience planning for community services, investment in virtual community platforms, promotion of inclusive community engagement","Technologies":"Virtual community platforms, digital service delivery systems, community resilience planning tools","People":"Residents, community service providers, local government","Owner":"Community organizations, local government, technology providers"}]}
